description: This table contains hospital account transaction diagnoses from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Because multiple diagnosis codes can be associated with one charge, each diagnosis will have a unique line number.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account associated with the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The post date of a transaction.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area with which a transaction is associated.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the diagnosis code.

columns.name: DX_QUAL_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
A qualifier entered with a diagnosis code in charge entry.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Acute


Chronic


Temporary
